title: HTTP
body: Pls help me with RADS error pls

replies.body: That's very nondescript. Exactly what happens the moment you double click League's icon from your desktop?

Hi,

Did you read [the sticky](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom-updated-troubleshooting) in the help & support forums & try the DNS fixes mentioned there?

Out of interest, what ISP are you using?

Mindstar
